definition: see 芙蓉[fu2 rong2], lotus/food that has been minced, shredded, or ground into a paste, suitable for stuffing or making a sauce
short name for Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: How does the lotus fairy throw a banquet?
sentences.chinese: 想知道芙蓉花精是如何設宴的嗎？

sentences.english: This is how I made the hibiscus flowers for my Hawaiian cake.
sentences.chinese: 這是我如何作出芙蓉花爲我的夏威夷蛋糕。

sentences.english: The optimum extracting conditions of total flavones in Hibiscus manihot flower were investigated by using the orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 用正交實驗探討菜芙蓉花總黃酮的最佳提取條件。
冰雹摧毀了我的芙蓉花。
